방해물과 위험요소

Obstacles and Hazards
Obstacle/HazardEffect
Acid tank1d6 피해 per round, or 10d6 per round for total immersion; plus 독 fumes.
대마법 보호장Negates all 주문 or magical effects.
차원의 닻 trapBlocks bodily extradimensional travel.
Hurricane-force 바람Ranged 공격 impossible, flight virtually impossible.
Lava pit2d6 피해 per round, or 20d6 per round for total immersion; plus continuing 피해.
Permanent 무지갯빛의 구Requires seven different 주문 to 바이패스.
Permanent 짙은 안개이동 at one-tenth normal 속도, –2 penalty on 공격 and 피해 (good when coupled with incorporeal 몬스터).
Permanent 힘의 장벽Blocks most 주문 and ethereal travel, can’t be dispelled.
Three-dimensional 던전Levitation/flying required to 이동 between 범위.
Unconnected 방Teleportation required to 이동 between 범위.
Variable gravityAs 중력 역전, but direction random each round.

슬라임, 곰팡이, 버섯

Slimes, Molds, and Fungi

For 목적 of 주문 and other special effects, all 슬라임, 곰팡이, 버섯 are treated as plants. Like 함정, dangerous slimes and molds have 도전 지수, and characters earn experience points for encountering them.

흘러넘치는 슬라임 (Cr 21):
Flux Slime (CR 21):

흘러넘치는 슬라임 appears as a clear, viscous liquid that seeps from some unseen origin point. This origin point is extradimensional, so the slime may even appear in midair. As the slime flows, it settles and fills the 범위 around the origin point.

흘러넘치는 슬라임 seems to be an inert substance, devoid of sentience. It is not caustic or toxic, but it radiates an 대마법 보호장 within a radius of 10 feet. This 대마법 보호장 has a 시전자 레벨 of 21. Any quantity of slime that is removed from the main 광역 yellows and hardens in a matter of minutes, turning into a flaky material that will not adhere to anything.

In reality, 흘러넘치는 슬라임 is a growth with a ravenous appetite for magical forces. It is a natural draining phenomenon: Magical 정령 흡수 through the origin point in one direction in exchange for the residue on the far side. The 대마법 보호장 a 흘러넘치는 슬라임 generates is actually the byproduct of the consumption of magical energy.

In addition to the 항마 field’s effects, 마법 아이템 that come into contact with 흘러넘치는 슬라임 permanently lose their magical 능력; creatures with spell-like or super-natural 능력 that come into contact with it take 2d6 points of temporary 건강 피해 per round while it devours flesh; creatures without such 능력 are immune to this effect.

On the first round of contact, the slime can be scraped off a creature, but after that it must be frozen, burned, or cut away (dealing 피해 to the victim as well). Extreme cold, heat, or sunlight destroys a patch of 흘러넘치는 슬라임.

When destroyed, a patch of slime releases the byproducts of its magical digestion in a dangerous 폭발 that radiates out 50 feet. All creatures caught in this 폭발 are subject to some random and permanent 변환 effect, as generated on the table below. Each 폭발 generates one of these effects. Creatures may resist this effect with a Fortitude 내성 굴림 (DC 29).

d%Result
01–10Blindness (as 실명/실청 spell)
11–16Cursed (as 저주 부여 spell; –4 enhancement penalty on 명중 굴림, 내성 굴림, 능력 판정, and 스킬 판정)
17–26Deafness (as 실명/실청 spell)
27–32분해 (subject is destroyed by a 분해 spell)
33–40에테리얼화 (as 에테리얼화 spell)
41–48Gaseous (as 기체 형태 spell)
49–54강철 육체 (as 강철 육체 spell)
55–60Petrification (as 살에서 돌로 spell)
61–68이세계 전이 (subject instantly 운송수단 to a random plane)
69–74변이 (as 변이 other spell; choose form randomly)
75–80중력 역전 (흘러넘치는 슬라임 becomes the center of a 중력 역전 spell).
81–88순간이동 (each subject 순간이동 to a different,  random location)
89–94시간 동결 (as 시간 동결 spell)
95–00Reverse aging (subject gets younger each year, disappearing at moment of “birth”)

After the 폭발, the extradimensional origin point is sealed.
